title: Support Builder Vancouver
description: Help us grow the Bitcoin builder community in Vancouver. Your donation supports meetups, educational content, and community events.
headline: Support Our Mission
subheadline: Your donation helps us host meetups, create educational content, and build a stronger Bitcoin community in Vancouver.

whyDonate.title: Free Meetups
whyDonate.description: We keep our meetups free and open to everyone. Your donation helps cover venue costs and refreshments.

whyDonate.title: Educational Content
whyDonate.description: We create tutorials, guides, and presentations to help people learn about Bitcoin development.

whyDonate.title: Community Growth
whyDonate.description: Your support helps us expand our reach and bring more builders into the Bitcoin ecosystem.

whyDonate.title: Open Source
whyDonate.description: We contribute to and support open-source Bitcoin projects that benefit the entire community.

thankYouMessage: Thank you for supporting Builder Vancouver! Your generosity helps us continue our mission of growing the Bitcoin builder community.

meta.title: Donate to Builder Vancouver | Support Bitcoin Education
meta.description: Support Builder Vancouver with a Bitcoin Lightning donation. Help us host meetups, create educational content, and grow the Bitcoin builder community.
